name: Perihelion (fuseinabowl, Bollard, BeastCountenance)
description:
It’s the apocalypse, society has collapsed and the sun is slowly roasting the earth. Navigate the wasteland to reach the only helicopter left on the planet with tinted windows and working AC. Grab any water you find on your way and make sure to avoid the killer waves of radiation that bathe the environment every 10 seconds. “Slowly” may not have been the correct choice of words.

Controls:

A and D / Left Stick - Move left and right
Space / A - Jump
R / Back - Reset

Credits:

By Anthony Diggle, Tony Dong, Bradley Pollard.

Includes assets from http://www.textures4photoshop.com/

Includes assets from https://kenney.nl/

Includes sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Includes sound effects from https://opengameart.org/

Includes fonts from https://fontsarena.com/blog/free-vintage-typewriter-fonts/

Includes music from https://incompetech.com/
